name: ABX-INFLUENCE_DETECT
function: Computes Influence Composite Scores (ICS) across domains using structured TVM vector frames with deterministic metrics (CVP, TLL, RD, CDEC, RRS).
inputs: frames: List of TVM vector frames (structured, numeric)
outputs: ics_bundle: Influence metrics per domain with not_computable flags
canonical_statement: ϟ₈ (INFLUENCE_DETECT) frames structured observations into domain-agnostic influence metrics without asserting causality or privileging any domain, emitting deterministic ICS bundles with explicit not_computable fields when inputs are missing.
